comments:
I created a 14 EAR and all the default modules for it.  Then in the
application.xml I copied the URI for the ejb module and pasted so it replaced
the URI of the connector module, saved and ran validation.  It looks like this
is a general problem because I hit a similar exception when replacing the app
client module's uri.

Neeraj, This is a EAR Validation scenario. Please take a look at it if possible
for 0.7 during the EAR Validator fixups
Changed Version field given new release numbering.

I got the following message  "The module has duplicate uri in EAR", seems that 
it got fixed during validation porting.
